00005 OutgoingClient::OutgoingClient(RequestQueue* queue) :
00006     _outgoingQueue(queue),
00007     _shutdown(false)
00008 {
00009     pthread_mutex_init(&_runMutex, NULL);
00010     pthread_mutex_init(&_queueMutex, NULL);
00011 }

00014 OutgoingClient::setOutgoingQueue(RequestQueue* queue)

00019 void
00020 OutgoingClient::addServer(int32_t serverId,
00021                           std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds,
00022                           std::string serverAddress,
00023                           int32_t serverPort)
00024 {
00025     RemoteServer* server = new RemoteServer(serverAddress, serverPort);
00026 
00027     if (server == NULL) {
00028         return;
00029     }
00030 
00031     _serverMap.insert(std::pair<int32_t, RemoteServer*>(serverId, server));
00032 
00033     for (int32_t i = 0; i < serviceIds.size(); i++) {
00034         _serviceMap.insert(std::pair<int32_t, RemoteServer*>(serviceIds[i], server));
00035     }
00036 }
00037 
00038 void
00039 OutgoingClient::removeServer(int32_t serverId)
00040 {
00041     RemoteServer* server = _serverMap.find(serverId)->second;
00042     std::map<int32_t, RemoteServer*>::iterator it;
00043 
00044     if (server == NULL) {
00045         return;
00046     }
00047 
00048     for (std::map<int32_t, RemoteServer*>::iterator it = _serviceMap.begin();
00049          it != _serviceMap.end();
00050          it++) {
00051         if (server == it->second) {
00052             _serviceMap.erase(it);
00053         }
00054     }
00055     
00056     it = _serverMap.find(serverId);
00057     _serverMap.erase(it);
00058 
00059     delete server;
00060     server = NULL;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void
00064 OutgoingClient::run()
00065 {
00066     // Check the run mutex, can only be running once
00067     int runfailed = -1;
00068     struct timespec check_timeout;
00069 
00070     // Make sure our internal state is sane
00071     if (_outgoingQueue == NULL) {
00072         return;
00073     }
00074 
00075     clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &check_timeout);
00076 
00077     runfailed = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&_runMutex, &check_timeout);
00078 
00079     if (runfailed) {
00080         return;
00081     }
00082 
00083     _outgoingQueue->queueLock(&_queueMutex);
00084 
00085     while(!_shutdown) {
00086         struct timespec timeout;
00087         int result = -1;
00088 
00089         clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &timeout);
00090         timeout.tv_sec += 10; // Wait 10 seconds for timeout
00091 
00092         result = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&_queueMutex, &timeout);
00093 
00094         // timedlock returns 0 on success, other on error/timeout
00095         if (!result) {
00096             processOutgoingQueue();
00097 
00098             pthread_mutex_unlock(&_queueMutex);
00099             _outgoingQueue->queueLock(&_queueMutex);
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     // Unlock the shutdown for restart
00104     _shutdown = false;
00105     pthread_mutex_unlock(&_runMutex);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void
00109 OutgoingClient::shutdown()
00110 {
00111     _shutdown = true;
00112 }

00114 std::vector<Server>
00115 OutgoingClient::getServerList()
00116 {
00117     std::vector<Server> return_list;
00118 
00119     // a single instance of each server is contained in _serverMap
00120     for (std::map<int32_t, RemoteServer*>::iterator it = _serverMap.begin();
00121          it != _serverMap.end();
00122          it++) {
00123         Server server;
00124         std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds;
00125 
00126         server.setServerId(it->first);
00127 
00128         // iterate over the service ids to pull the list for this server
00129         std::map<int32_t, RemoteServer*>::iterator service_it;
00130 
00131         for (service_it = _serviceMap.begin();
00132              service_it != _serviceMap.end();
00133              service_it++) {
00134             if (service_it->second == it->second) {
00135                 serviceIds.push_back(it->first);
00136             }
00137         }
00138 
00139         server.setServiceIds(serviceIds);
00140         server.setServerAddress(it->second->getServerAddress());
00141         server.setServerPort(it->second->getServerPort());
00142 
00143         return_list.push_back(server);
00144     }
00145 
00146     return return_list;
00147 }
00148 
00149 void
00150 OutgoingClient::processOutgoingQueue()
00151 {
00152     if (_outgoingQueue == NULL) {
00153         return;
00154     }
00155 
00156     // Process all the known service ids that are pending being sent
00157     std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds = _outgoingQueue->getServiceIds();
00158 
00159     for (int32_t i = 0; i < serviceIds.size(); i++) {
00160         if (_serviceMap.find(serviceIds[i]) != _serviceMap.end()) {
00161             RemoteServer* server = _serviceMap.find(serviceIds[i])->second;
00162             std::queue<queueItem*> items;
00163 
00164             if (server == NULL) {
00165                 continue;
00166             }
00167             
00168             items = _outgoingQueue->getItemQueue(serviceIds[i]);
00169 
00170             while (!items.empty() &&
00171                    items.front() != NULL) {
00172                 queueItem item;
00173                 item.methodId = items.front()->methodId;
00174                 item.serverId = items.front()->serverId;
00175                 item.argList = items.front()->argList;
00176                 items.pop();
00177                 
00178                 server->sendRequest(serviceIds[i], item);
00179             }
00180         }
00181     }
00182 
00183     // Process all the items with a service id of 0 (unknown)
00184     std::queue<queueItem*> serverItems;
00185     serverItems = _outgoingQueue->getItemQueue(0);
00186 
00187     while (!serverItems.empty() &&
00188            serverItems.front() != NULL) {
00189         queueItem item;
00190         item.methodId = serverItems.front()->methodId;
00191         item.serverId = serverItems.front()->serverId;
00192         item.argList = serverItems.front()->argList;
00193         serverItems.pop();
00194         
00195         if (_serverMap.find(item.serverId) != _serverMap.end()) {
00196             RemoteServer* server = _serverMap.find(item.serverId)->second;
00197             if (server != NULL) {
00198                 server->sendRequest(0, item);
00199             }
00200         }
00201     }
00202 }
